Our example Helm chart repo

Getting Started

A chart repo for storing charts.

You can add this repository to your local helm configuration as follows :

$ helm repo add helm-repo http://localhost:4000
$ helm repo update

Charts

Openvpn

Home | Source

A openvpn Helm chart for Kubernetes

$ helm install helm-repo/openvpn --name myrelease --version 0.1.5
Chart Version App Version Date
openvpn-0.1.5 2.7.5 Wed, 01 Jan 2020 21:31:10 +0100
openvpn-0.0.1 2.7.5 Wed, 01 Jan 2020 18:38:23 +0100
